change.changenote: Section 1 (4) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 45/2020, effective March 27, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: In British Columbia, Newfoundland and Labrador, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Prince Edward Island and Yukon, in this Instrument, derivative means a contract or instrument if each of the following apply:

change.changenote: Section 1 (4) (b) (ii) and (iv) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 45/2020, effective March 27, 2020.

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: in British Columbia and Newfoundland and Labrador, a futures contract;
in British Columbia and Newfoundland and Labrador, an option;

change.changenote: Section 1 (5) (a) and (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 45/2020, effective March 27, 2020.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: in Alberta, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia and Saskatchewan, a "derivative" as defined in the securities legislation of the local jurisdiction, and
in British Columbia, Newfoundland and Labrador, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Prince Edward Island and Yukon, a "derivative" as defined in subsection 1 (4).
